Text: Jalucian, please upload 48 hrs. (1982)! It's released on the 4th of June with Trading Places and Norbit. http://www.blu-ray.com/movies/Trading-Places-and-Norbit-and-48-Hrs-Blu-ray/70438/

I believe those are both re-releases of some kind, because both have been available in 720p for a year or two, but there are no torrents with relatively small file sizes, so I'll put them on the to-do list. Thanks for the request.

There's already a Kingdom release of 48 Hrs in 1080p that's only 3gigs, which isn't too much bigger than what I would do, so I'll probably skip that one. But I'll go ahead and do Trading Places. Just do a search for 48 Hrs 1080p Kingdom.
